ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: PM Eyes is a knowledge-sharing platform focused on project management. We are committed to providing high-quality, practical content for project managers, helping them grow and progress in the field of project management.
OUR_MISSION_DESCRIPTION: Through sharing knowledge and experience in project management, we aim to build a professional, open learning community that promotes communication and development in the field of project management.
PRACTICALITY: Practicality: Focus on practical application and operability
INNOVATION: Innovation: Explore new methods and trends in project management
COMMUNITY: Community: Build a platform for project managers to communicate
